body: Wow, didn't expect one of Sanbun Kyoden's one-shots from 2009 to get a sequel. Would love to see sequels for Omoibito(sp?) Azure Sky, and his Yame no Hime(?) series, especially with Satomi and the one with the mom having an incest relationship with her younger son.
Yes! Sanbun Kyoden - inhabited islands finally get his sequel
I just wish kishizuka kenji just stop teasing us with these short color pages and make another original tankoubon already.
where is mikemono yuu ? I can't see the artstile of the author
